summary: This bill, the Veteran Jobs Training Act, amends Title 38 of the United States Code to increase funding for homeless veterans reintegration programs. Specifically, it modifies the authorization of appropriations outlined in Section 2021(i)(1) of title 38. The bill extends the authorization for fiscal years 2024 and 2025 and allocates $75,000,000 for fiscal year 2024 and each fiscal year thereafter for these programs.
